ISSUE.TITLE: Select v2: Save without adding any options
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v16.14.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **sqlite3** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.92.4** - choose data type as a `single select` field - save without adding any options ![Screenshot 2022-07-21 at 9 53 11 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86527202/180129704-d8e85932-3059-4044-9570-83bd2e9c3fb7.png) Expected behavior - Either don't allow select field creation without any options (OR) - Create select field successfully with options list set to void
